mn13:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn13:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisimsu.
mn13:2.4: yam nuna mayam yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyama”ti.
mn13:2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhu yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodimsu;
mn13:2.6: sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhu te annatitthiya paribbajaka etadavocum:
mn13:3.1: “samano, avuso, gotamo kamanam parinnam pannapeti, mayampi kamanam parinnam pannapema;
mn13:3.2: samano, avuso, gotamo rupanam parinnam pannapeti, mayampi rupanam parinnam pannapema;
mn13:3.3: samano, avuso, gotamo vedananam parinnam pannapeti, mayampi vedananam parinnam pannapema;
mn13:3.4: idha no, avuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaso, kim nanakaranam samanassa va gotamassa amhakam va—
mn13:3.5: yadidam dhammadesanaya va dhammadesanam, anusasaniya va anusasanin”ti?
mn13:4.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam bhasitam neva abhinandimsu, nappatikkosimsu;
mn13:5.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn13:5.2: “idha mayam, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisimha.
mn13:5.5: yam nuna mayam yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyama’ti.
mn13:5.6: Atha kho mayam, bhante, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankamimha; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodimha;
mn13:5.7: sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimha. Ekamantam nisinne kho amhe, bhante, te annatitthiya paribbajaka etadavocum:
mn13:5.8: ‘samano, avuso, gotamo kamanam parinnam pannapeti, mayampi kamanam parinnam pannapema.
mn13:5.9: Samano, avuso, gotamo rupanam parinnam pannapeti, mayampi rupanam parinnam pannapema.
mn13:5.10: Samano, avuso, gotamo vedananam parinnam pannapeti, mayampi vedananam parinnam pannapema.
mn13:5.11: Idha no, avuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaso, kim nanakaranam samanassa va gotamassa amhakam va, yadidam dhammadesanaya va dhammadesanam anusasaniya va anusasanin’ti.
mn13:5.12: Atha kho mayam, bhante, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam bhasitam neva abhinandimha, nappatikkosimha;
mn13:6.2: ‘ko panavuso, kamanam assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam?
mn13:6.3: Ko rupanam assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam?
mn13:6.4: Ko vedananam assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan’ti?
mn13:6.5: Evam puttha, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka na ceva sampayissanti, uttarinca vighatam apajjissanti.
mn13:6.8: Naham tam, bhikkhave, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya yo imesam panhanam veyyakaranena cittam aradheyya, annatra tathagatena va tathagatasavakena va, ito va pana sutva.
mn13:7.4: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
mn13:7.8: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
mn13:7.10: Yam kho, bhikkhave, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—ayam kamanam assado.
mn13:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena sippatthanena jivikam kappeti—
mn13:8.3: yadi muddaya yadi gananaya yadi sankhanena yadi kasiya yadi vanijjaya yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi rajaporisena yadi sippannatarena—
mn13:8.4: sitassa purakkhato unhassa purakkhato damsamakasavatatapasarisapasamphassehi rissamano khuppipasaya miyamano;
mn13:8.5: ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:9.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa evam utthahato ghatato vayamato te bhoga nabhinipphajjanti.
mn13:9.2: So socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati:
mn13:9.3: ‘mogham vata me utthanam, aphalo vata me vayamo’ti.
mn13:9.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:10.1: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa evam utthahato ghatato vayamato te bhoga abhinipphajjanti.
mn13:10.2: So tesam bhoganam arakkhadhikaranam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti:
mn13:10.3: ‘kinti me bhoge neva rajano hareyyum, na cora hareyyum, na aggi daheyya, na udakam vaheyya, na appiya dayada hareyyun’ti.
mn13:10.4: Tassa evam arakkhato gopayato te bhoge rajano va haranti, cora va haranti, aggi va dahati, udakam va vahati, appiya va dayada haranti.
mn13:10.5: So socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati, sammoham apajjati:
mn13:10.7: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu rajanopi rajuhi vivadanti, khattiyapi khattiyehi vivadanti, brahmanapi brahmanehi vivadanti, gahapatipi gahapatihi vivadanti, matapi puttena vivadati, puttopi matara vivadati, pitapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitara vivadati, bhatapi bhatara vivadati, bhatapi bhaginiya vivadati, bhaginipi bhatara vivadati, sahayopi sahayena vivadati.
mn13:11.2: Te tattha kalahaviggahavivadapanna annamannam panihipi upakkamanti, ledduhipi upakkamanti, dandehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti.
mn13:11.3: Te tattha maranampi nigacchanti, maranamattampi dukkham.
mn13:11.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:12.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu asicammam gahetva, dhanukalapam sannayhitva, ubhatobyulham sangamam pakkhandanti ususupi khippamanesu, sattisupi khippamanasu, asisupi vijjotalantesu.
mn13:12.2: Te tattha usuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyapi vijjhanti, asinapi sisam chindanti.
mn13:12.3: Te tattha maranampi nigacchanti, maranamattampi dukkham.
mn13:12.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:13.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu asicammam gahetva, dhanukalapam sannayhitva, addavalepana upakariyo pakkhandanti ususupi khippamanesu, sattisupi khippamanasu, asisupi vijjotalantesu.
mn13:13.2: Te tattha usuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyapi vijjhanti, chakanakayapi osincanti, abhivaggenapi omaddanti, asinapi sisam chindanti.
mn13:13.3: Te tattha maranampi nigacchanti, maranamattampi dukkham.
mn13:13.4: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:14.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu sandhimpi chindanti, nillopampi haranti, ekagarikampi karonti, paripanthepi titthanti, paradarampi gacchanti.
mn13:14.2: Tamenam rajano gahetva vividha kammakarana karenti—
mn13:14.3: kasahipi talenti, vettehipi talenti, addhadandakehipi talenti; hatthampi chindanti, padampi chindanti, hatthapadampi chindanti, kannampi chindanti, nasampi chindanti, kannanasampi chindanti; bilangathalikampi karonti, sankhamundikampi karonti, rahumukhampi karonti, jotimalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti, cirakavasikampi karonti, eneyyakampi karonti, balisamamsikampi karonti, kahapanikampi karonti, kharapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palalapithakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osincanti, sunakhehipi khadapenti, jivantampi sule uttasenti, asinapi sisam chindanti.
mn13:14.4: Te tattha maranampi nigacchanti, maranamattampi dukkham.
mn13:14.5: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo sanditthiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:15.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti.
mn13:15.2: Te kayena duccaritam caritva, vacaya duccaritam caritva, manasa duccaritam caritva, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mn13:15.3: Ayampi, bhikkhave, kamanam adinavo samparayiko, dukkhakkhandho kamahetu kamanidanam kamadhikaranam kamanameva hetu.
mn13:16.2: Yo kho, bhikkhave, kamesu chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam—idam kamanam nissaranam.
mn13:17.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam kamanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nappajananti te vata samam va kame parijanissanti, param va tathattaya samadapessanti yatha patipanno kame parijanissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn13:17.2: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam kamanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam pajananti, te vata samam va kame parijanissanti param va tathattaya samadapessanti yatha patipanno kame parijanissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn13:18.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, khattiyakanna va brahmanakanna va gahapatikanna va pannarasavassuddesika va solasavassuddesika va, natidigha natirassa natikisa natithula natikali naccodata parama sa, bhikkhave, tasmim samaye subha vannanibhati?
mn13:18.4: Yam kho, bhikkhave, subham vannanibham paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
mn13:19.2: Idha, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginim passeyya aparena samayena asitikam va navutikam va vassasatikam va jatiya, jinnam gopanasivankam bhoggam dandaparayanam pavedhamanam gacchantim aturam gatayobbanam khandadantam palitakesam, vilunam khalitasiram valinam tilakahatagattam.
mn13:19.4: ya purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti?
mn13:20.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginim passeyya abadhikam dukkhitam balhagilanam, sake muttakarise palipannam semanam, annehi vutthapiyamanam, annehi samvesiyamanam.
mn13:20.3: ya purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti?
mn13:21.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginim passeyya sariram sivathikaya chadditam—
mn13:21.2: ekahamatam va dvihamatam va tihamatam va, uddhumatakam vinilakam vipubbakajatam.
mn13:21.4: ya purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti?
mn13:22.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginim passeyya sariram sivathikaya chadditam—
mn13:22.2: kakehi va khajjamanam, kulalehi va khajjamanam, gijjhehi va khajjamanam, kankehi va khajjamanam, sunakhehi va khajjamanam, byagghehi va khajjamanam, dipihi va khajjamanam, singalehi va khajjamanam, vividhehi va panakajatehi khajjamanam.
mn13:22.3: Tam kim mannatha, bhikkhave, ya purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti?
mn13:23-28.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginim passeyya sariram sivathikaya chadditam—
mn13:23-28.2: atthikasankhalikam samamsalohitam nharusambandham, atthikasankhalikam nimamsalohitamakkhitam nharusambandham, atthikasankhalikam apagatamamsalohitam nharusambandham, atthikani apagatasambandhani disavidisavikkhittani—
mn13:23-28.3: annena hatthatthikam, annena padatthikam, annena gopphakatthikam, annena janghatthikam, annena urutthikam, annena katitthikam, annena phasukatthikam, annena pitthitthikam, annena khandhatthikam, annena givatthikam, annena hanukatthikam, annena dantatthikam, annena sisakataham.
mn13:23-28.4: Tam kim mannatha, bhikkhave, ya purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti?
mn13:29.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, tameva bhaginim passeyya sariram sivathikaya chadditam—
mn13:29.2: atthikani setani sankhavannapatibhagani, atthikani punjakitani terovassikani, atthikani putini cunnakajatani.
mn13:29.4: ya purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti?
mn13:30.2: Yo, bhikkhave, rupesu chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam—idam rupanam nissaranam.
mn13:31.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam rupanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nappajananti te vata samam va rupe parijanissanti, param va tathattaya samadapessanti yatha patipanno rupe parijanissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn13:31.2: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam rupanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam pajananti te vata samam va rupe parijanissanti param va tathattaya samadapessanti yatha patipanno rupe parijanissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn13:32.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn13:32.3: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati, neva tasmim samaye attabyabadhayapi ceteti, na parabyabadhayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti;
mn13:33-35.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati …pe…
mn13:33-35.2: yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga, upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati …pe…
mn13:33-35.3: yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati, neva tasmim samaye attabyabadhayapi ceteti, na parabyabadhayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti;
mn13:36.2: Yam, bhikkhave, vedana anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma—ayam vedananam adinavo.
mn13:37.2: Yo, bhikkhave, vedanasu chandaragavinayo, chandaragappahanam—idam vedananam nissaranam.
mn13:38.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam vedananam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nappajananti, te vata samam va vedanam parijanissanti, param va tathattaya samadapessanti yatha patipanno vedanam parijanissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn13:38.2: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va evam vedananam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam pajananti te vata samam va vedanam parijanissanti, param va tathattaya samadapessanti yatha patipanno vedanam parijanissatiti—thanametam vijjati”ti.
mn13:38.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
